item.title: Elon Musk Discloses Why Rebranding Twitter To X Is Crucial & Impact Of Shiba Inu Dog
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Elon Musk has officially rebranded Twitter to X as it was acquired by X Corp, a subsidiary of X Holdings. Elon Musk, CTO of X, explains this is not simply a corporate name change but a company improving its products and services, as well as changing its vision. In a separate post, he said we

item.title: Bitcoin Transaction Volume Tanks While Dogecoin’s Hits 16-Week High
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
The month of July 2023 has particularly belonged to altcoins with the ruling over the Ripple-SEC lawsuit and Bitcoin consolidating on the other hand. item.title: Bitcoin Price Prediction: BTC Below $29k – Can Bulls Save The Day?

item.description:

item.title: Binance and Chief CZ Proceed for the Dismissal of the CFTC Lawsuit
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
Crypto exchange Binance, its founder Changpeng Zhao, and former Chief Compliance Officer Samuel Lim are planning to seek the dismissal of the CFTC lawsuit filed earlier this year in March 2023. As per the court filing on Monday, July 24, the response to the CFTC complaint will be due by July 27. As a result,

The post Binance and Chief CZ Proceed for the Dismissal of the CFTC Lawsuit appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: AI Text Detection Tool from OpenAI Closed Secretly
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
OpenAI, a leading artificial intelligence research lab, has recently made headlines by quietly shutting down its AI detection tool. OpenAI’s decision to unplug the AI Classifier was made discreetly, as no new announcement was made. Instead, the closure was showcased in a footnote to the original blog post announcing the tool’s release. The note simply

The post AI Text Detection Tool from OpenAI Closed Secretly appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Breaking: UBS To Pay US Fed $268.5 Mln Fine Over Credit Suisse Misconduct
item.dc:creator: Anvesh Reddy
item.description:
The US Federal Reserve Board on Monday announced levying of a $268.5 million penalty against UBS, over misconduct by Credit Suisse that dates back to 2021. Earlier in March 2023, the UBS Group acquired Credit Suisse. The United States central bank said the bank’s misconduct involved Credit Suisse’s unsafe counterparty credit risk management practices with

The post Breaking: UBS To Pay US Fed $268.5 Mln Fine Over Credit Suisse Misconduct appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Breaking: Crypto Asset Funds Record First Week Of Outflow, Institutions Selling Bitcoin?
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Crypto asset investment products recorded the first week of outflows after four consecutive weeks of inflows from institutions that totaled $742 million, according to a report by CoinShares on July 24. Crypto asset investment products saw minor outflows totaling $6.5 million. Traders speculate whether the institutional buying is over as they offload some Bitcoin holdings.

The post Breaking: Crypto Asset Funds Record First Week Of Outflow, Institutions Selling Bitcoin? appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
Crypto asset investment products recorded the first week of outflows after four consecutive weeks of inflows from institutions that totaled $742 million, according to a report by CoinShares on July 24. Crypto asset investment products saw minor outflows totaling $6.5 million. Traders speculate whether the institutional buying is over as they offload some Bitcoin holdings.

The post Breaking: Crypto Asset Funds Record First Week Of Outflow, Institutions Selling Bitcoin? appeared first on CoinGape.
